EmailTemplate.description: Require Personal Guaranty and Physical Address Verification. Attach PG form.
EmailTemplate.name: Gulf Credit PG and PAV
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Gulf Fuel Card Application Status
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for applying for our fuel card program!
In order to enroll, you must submit a Personal Guaranty. An officer of your company must complete and sign the form, which you can either scan/email or fax back to me once completed.
To comply with the Patriot Act, our bank is requesting you verify your physical address for approval. Please provide documentation from a third party to verify your business is located at the correct address listed on your application.
To pass verification, the bank requires a copy of one of the following documents:
Utility bill or insurance document showing that the bill is mailed to the physical street address or that it services the physical address of the business Lease agreement which identifies the business and the physical address of the office Certified articles of incorporation An unexpired government-issued business license.
Feel free to scan and email the verification to me at the email address noted below, or if you prefer, you can fax it to me at {!User.Fax}. You can also call me at {!User.Phone} if you have any questions.
Sincerely,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} Phone - {!User.Phone}
Fax - {!User.Fax}
{!User.Email}
CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: "This message contains confidential information of WEX Inc. It is intended only for the use of the designated recipient(s) stated above and further distribution of the information is prohibited. If you have received this message in error, please notify sender immediately by telephone or reply by e-mail and delete the entire message and any attachments."
WEX Inc., 97 Darling Avenue, South Portland, ME 04106
This is an advertisement from WEX Inc. If you no longer wish to receive future email advertisements from {!User.Email}, email us to unsubscribe. Please be sure to include your name, company name and email address in the email.
